language.name: English
sr.gamemode_info.standard_race_2: Reach the finish before everyone else!
sr.gamemode_info.tactics_race_2: All players get the same items. Checkpoints grant new items!
sr.gamemode_info.time_attack_2: Reach the finish as fast as you can!
sr.gamemode_info.gauntlet_race_2: You have 10 minutes to reach the finish. Good luck!
sr.gamemode_info.timed_ko_fest_2: Whoever has the most KOs at the end of the time limit wins!
sr.gamemode_info.3_lives_elimination_2: Die three times and you're out. Last player standing wins!
sr.gamemode_info.resource_control_2: Items always spawn in the same place. Highest KO count wins!
sr.gamemode_info.target_attack_2: Break every target as fast as you can!
sr.tutorial.cps_1: Did you know that checkpoints restore
sr.tutorial.elytra_pad: You hit an elytra pad! Open your wings and glide to the finish line.
sr.tutorial.hit_checkpoints: Remember: Your laps will only be counted if you've hit every checkpoint!
sr.tutorial.sprint_to_gain_speed: Sprint to gain speed over time. Jumping or taking damage will make you lose speed!
sr.tutorial.swimming_is_fast: Don't be afraid of water. You can swim fast!
sr.tutorial.switch_alters_track: This is a switch. Press it and the track will be altered in some way.
sr.tutorial.use_item_by_pressing: Most items can be activated by using
sr.error.cannot_hold_items_in_offhand:  Sorry, you can't hold items in your offhand!
sr.error.enderman_already_active:  You already have an enderman active!
sr.error.no_gamemode_function:  This item does not not have a function in this gamemode!
sr.error.cannot_reset_at_this_time:  You cannot reset at this time!
sr.error.warp_failed_no_loaded_checkpoin:  Warp failed! The next checkpoint is not within loading distance.
sr.error.warp_failed_no_enemy_found:  Warp failed! No enemy players were found.
sr.error.track_does_not_support_ai:  This track does not support AI.
sr.error.cannot_restart_while_others_are:  Cannot restart! Other players are waiting to play!
sr.error.invite_has_expired:  Too slow! This invite has expired.
sr.inventory.you_can_only_call_a_vote: You can only call a vote
sr.game.cannot_find_activator_node: Can't find an activator node and a player start node!
sr.game.hold_item_in_hand: Hold an item in your hand to use an enchanting table.
sr.game.invalid_time_cheats_detected: Cheats detected! Time will not be recorded.
sr.game.players_returned_to_lobby: Players have been returned to the lobby.
sr.game.all_players_have_1_life: All players now have 1 life. Survivor wins!
sr.game.finished_editing_random_tracks: Finished editing the random track pool.
sr.game.enderman_found_nothing: Your enderman couldn't find anything to steal. Sorry!
sr.game.item_stolen_by: Oh no! Your item was stolen by

sr.game.10_min_ahead: Incredible! You're over 10 minutes ahead of your previous lap!
sr.game.10_min_behind: Ouch... you're over 10 minutes behind your previous lap!
sr.game.cannot_count_above_25: Sorry, I can't count higher than 25!
sr.mid_game_vote.waiting_for_other_playe: Waiting for other players to respond...
sr.mid_game_vote.vote_is_for_active_play: Vote is for active players only.
sr.mid_game_vote.reminder_use_inventory_: Reminder: During gameplay, you can use the chain command block in your inventory to return to the lobby.
sr.lobby.wait_before_making_input: Please wait a moment before making an input...
sr.lobby.use_key_to_allow_2: to allow this track to appear randomly.
sr.lobby.use_key_to_ban_2: to ban this track from appearing randomly.
sr.lobby.team_forced_to_cyan:  Auto-balance! You've been switched to the cyan team.

sr.lobby.orange_and_cyan_tied: Tie! Orange and Cyan got the same number of points.
sr.lobby.tagged_as_admin: You have been tagged as an admin.
sr.lobby.tagged_use_key_2: to give other players the ability to change lobby settings.
sr.lobby.non_admin_can_load_saves_1: You aren't an admin, but you can still
sr.lobby.all_active_players_must_be_near:  All active players must be within 10m of this command block to play the credits!
sr.lobby.waiting_for_players_to_ready_up: Waiting for players to ready up...
sr.lobby.player_must_ready_to_start: player must ready up to start the game.
sr.lobby.players_must_ready_to_start: players must ready up to start the game.
sr.lobby.player_must_unready_to_pause: player must un-ready to pause the lobby.
sr.lobby.players_must_unready_to_pause: players must un-ready to pause the lobby.
sr.lobby.vote_for_next_race_track: Vote for the next race track!
sr.lobby.vote_for_next_battle_arena: Vote for the next battle arena!
sr.lobby.admins_will_choose_track:  There are admins playing! They will choose the track.
sr.lobby.must_be_admin_to_do_this:  You must be an admin to do this!
sr.lobby.arcade.2d_platformer: A full-length 2D platformer game about 4 characters with unique abilities.
sr.lobby.arcade.bliss: A proof of concept for a 2D platformer.
sr.lobby.arcade.doze_off: A third-person block puzzler where the player drives a bulldozer.
sr.lobby.arcade.escapecraft_blue: A spinoff of the popular Escapecraft series. Can you escape the dungeon?
sr.lobby.arcade.mkmc: A combat racing minigame. The prequel to Sprint Racer!
sr.lobby.arcade.no_more_diamonds: A third-person adventure game with time travel mechanics.
sr.lobby.arcade.quattour: A co-op adventure game with gameplay similar to classic 3D collect-a-thon platformers.
sr.lobby.arcade.rematch: A multi-phase PVP game about exploring, shopping, and fighting.
sr.lobby.arcade.sky_scapers: A PVP game about flying with elytra and avoiding the seeker.
sr.grand_prix.cancelled_1: The grand prix has been canceled.
sr.grand_prix.cancelled_2: Sprint Racer will now function as normal.
sr.grand_prix.exit_2: Players have been returned to the lobby.

sr.grand_prix.started_2:
When players ready up, the contest will begin!
Re-enter the grand prix setup room to cancel.

In the grand prix, tracks will be played in the order you set.
Minimum: 1 round. | Maximum: 50 rounds.

sr.lobby.for_info_read_help_section: For further info, click on 'Help' and read the section titled
sr.lobby.options.admin_mode_on:  Admin mode enabled. Only admins can change lobby settings.
sr.lobby.options.admin_mode_off:  Admin mode disabled. Anyone can change lobby settings.
sr.lobby.options.race_ai_singleplayer:  In race mode, AI opponents will only appear in singleplayer.
sr.lobby.options.race_ai_always_on:  In race mode, AI opponents will always appear.
sr.lobby.options.race_ai_always_off:  In race mode, AI opponents will never appear.
sr.lobby.options.battle_ai_singleplayer:  In battle mode, AI opponents will only appear in singleplayer.
sr.lobby.options.battle_ai_always_on:  In battle mode, AI opponents will always appear.
sr.lobby.options.battle_ai_always_off:  In battle mode, AI opponents will never appear.
sr.lobby.options.race_ai_count:  In race mode, AI count is
sr.lobby.options.race_ai_count_auto:  In race mode, AIs will only be added if the player count is less than 4.
sr.lobby.options.battle_ai_count:  In battle mode, AI count is
sr.lobby.options.battle_ai_count_auto:  In battle mode, AIs will only be added if the player count is less than 4.
sr.lobby.options.ai_difficulty_auto:  AI difficulty set to adaptive (will cater to player skill level)
sr.lobby.options.ai_difficulty_very_easy:  AI difficulty set to very easy
sr.lobby.options.ai_rubberbanding_on:  AI rubber-banding is enabled. AI opponents will speed up or slow down in an effort to keep races competitive.
sr.lobby.options.restored_defaults:  Restored default settings for gamemodes, track selection, and items
sr.lobby.options.race_and_battle:  Gamemode set to race & battle mix
sr.lobby.options.item_balance_checkpoint:  Item Balance: Players further behind get better items based on their checkpoint splits (compared to 1st).
sr.lobby.options.item_balance_position:  Item Balance: Players further behind get better items based on their position compared to other players.
sr.lobby.options.items_all_gamemodes:  Items are enabled for all gamemodes
sr.lobby.options.items_battle_only:  Items are enabled in battle mode, disabled in race mode
sr.lobby.options.items_always_off:  Items are disabled for all gamemodes
sr.lobby.bossbar_speedometer_is_singlepl: Note: Bossbar speedometer is only visible in singleplayer!
sr.lobby.options.allow_ai_finish_on:  Games will allow AI players to finish if there are no active human players.
sr.lobby.options.allow_ai_finish_off:  Games will end immediately if there are no active human players.
sr.lobby.options.difficulty_ramp_up_off:  Difficulty ramp-up is disabled. Hard tracks will always be available.
sr.lobby.options.difficulty_ramp_up_on:  Difficulty ramp-up is enabled. The game will start by offering easier tracks and will gradually introduce harder tracks.
sr.lobby.options.endless_mode_on:  Endless mode enabled. Points won't be reset and the podium sequence won't be shown.
sr.lobby.options.absorption_always:  Players will always be given absorption at the start of races (with items).
sr.lobby.options.absorption_5plus:  Players will be given absorption at the start of races with 5+ players (with items).
sr.lobby.options.absorption_never:  Players will never be given absorption at the start of races.
sr.lobby.options.extra_chests_never:  Item chests will never spawn in larger clusters.
sr.lobby.options.extra_chests_5plus:  Item chests will spawn in larger clusters for groups of 5+ players. (Applies in race mode)
sr.lobby.options.crowd_sfx_on:  Crowd sound effects will play in Grand Prix mode.
sr.lobby.options.crowd_sfx_off:  Crowd sound effects are disabled in Grand Prix mode.
sr.lobby.options.grand_prix_loop_on:  Grand Prix will loop after the podium sequence.
sr.lobby.options.grand_prix_loop_off:  Grand Prix will end after the podium sequence (unless Endless Mode is active).
sr.lobby.options.item_balance_on__time:  Item Balance: Players further behind get better items based on their checkpoint splits (compared to 1st).
sr.lobby.options.item_balance_on__positi:  Item Balance: Players further behind get better items based on their position compared to other players.
sr.lobby.options.nearby_invisibility_nev:  Nearby players will never be made invisible.
sr.lobby.options.nearby_invisibility_alw:  In race mode, nearby players will be made invisible.
sr.lobby.options.nearby_invisibility_5pl:  In race mode, nearby players will be made invisible when there are 5+ players.
sr.lobby.options.music_reset_on_death_of:  Music will not be reset upon death.
sr.lobby.options.music_reset_on_death_on:  Music will be reset upon death (necessary on certain servers).
sr.lobby.options.any_player_loads_save_s:  Any player is allowed to load save states (does not include creating or deleting saves).
sr.lobby.options.only_admin_loads_save_s:  Only admins can load save states.
sr.lobby.options.hud_classic:  Sprint Racer will use the classic HUD during gameplay.
sr.lobby.options.hud_modern:  Sprint Racer will use the modern HUD during gameplay.
sr.lobby.villager_tip.1a: Did you know you can heal yourself by holding
sr.lobby.villager_tip.1b: ? You can do it in any gamemode. It works wonders in battle mode!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.2: I like to improvise shortcuts! You can get away with pretty much anything as long as you hit checkpoints.
sr.lobby.villager_tip.3: I hate slime traps! If I was more athletic I could easily jump over them...
sr.lobby.villager_tip.4: If your XP bar is flashing, that means you're in 'hitstun'! You can't self-heal or gain speed while stunned.
sr.lobby.villager_tip.5: I heard a rumor that enderman thieves can only see items in your main hand. If that's true, you could avoid having your items stolen by being empty-handed!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.6: You know those yellow clouds that get left behind when someone breaks an item chest? Those give you a slight speed boost if you run through them!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.7: Most traps and offensive items can't hit you while you're using the Invisibility item!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.8: I keep finding these weird miniature dragon eggs around the world. They've all got funny names. I wonder what they're for?
sr.lobby.villager_tip.9: I never thought the Jump Boost, Ender Pearl, or Elytra items were all that useful. Not until I witnessed someone win a race by shorcutting their way to every checkpoint. I think they memorized where the checkpoints were... that's cheating!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.10: Did you know you can hit yourself with TNT while flying with Elytra? It's tricky to pull off, but it gives you a ton of extra speed!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.11: Hear that noise I just made? That's the sound an anvil makes before it bashes your face. When you hear that sound, try using a Speed Boost or similar item to avoid getting hit!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.12: Have you played Time Attack with items on? I thought it would be unpredictable, but it turns out the same items spawn in the same place every time!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.13: If you use a trap item while sneaking, you'll throw it in the direction you're facing!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.14: In Time Attack mode, something might happen if you beat the track creator's best time!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.15: One time I tried throwing enchanted TNT directly at my feet. The explosion sent me into orbit!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.16: The Gauntlet is downright sadistic. Legends say it can be beaten in a mere 3 minutes and 30 seconds. How in the WORLD is that possible?!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.17: It's really fun to use the Elytra item when you're up extra high-- you can glide SUPER fast!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.18: Try stacking Speed Boost items before enchanting them. You can enchant up to 10 of them at the same time!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.19: Ever tried using TNT as a trap item? It works best if you drop the item instead of throwing it.
sr.lobby.villager_tip.20: I heard this map has a track editor in the downloadable version. It got cut out of the official Realms version... that's a shame!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.21: I miss the good old days... things used to be so simple. This wall pattern was everywhere!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.22: Did you know that you can talk to villagers in the lobby?
sr.lobby.villager_tip.23: Highlight Resort is the best map-- fight me.
sr.lobby.villager_tip.24a: Don't tell anyone I told you this... If you repeatedly press
sr.lobby.villager_tip.24b: while being launching upward with elytra, you'll gain extra height! Why? I don't know!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.25: Hey! Did you know you have the right to vote? Open your inventory in the middle of a round and you can vote to restart or end the current game!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.26a: Once you've gotten your use out of a Jump Boost item, you can quickly tap
sr.lobby.villager_tip.27a: I can't talk now, I'm power-walking!
sr.lobby.villager_tip.27b: I can't find the supermarket! Where did it go??
sr.cheats.drop_to_cycle: Drop to cycle through all items.
sr.cheats.that_was_your_only_skip: That was your only skip for this race. Don't miss any more!
sr.cheats.0to60: Instant acceleration, always run at top speed.
sr.cheats.alwaystimeattack: Gamemode is always Time Attack, play with multiple players!
sr.cheats.desperation: Last place runs a little faster.
sr.cheats.enchanter: Crouching tranforms your held item into an enchanted item.
sr.cheats.healthnut: Players regenerate health rapidly (except in battle mode).
sr.cheats.homing: Certain items home in on players.
sr.cheats.icandoanything: AI have an infinite amount of every item.
sr.cheats.iseeyou: Players always have a glowing effect.
sr.cheats.noafk: Players can't get marked as idle.
sr.cheats.revenge: Eliminated players can control chicken mines.
sr.cheats.sadist: Spawn in items whenever you want.
sr.cheats.timeless: Time limits are disabled (exception: Timed KO-fest).
sr.cheats.friendlyfire: Teammates can hit one another with items.
sr.cheats.itemrain: Random item drops rain from the sky.
sr.cheats.jschlatt: All music is replaced with stal.
sr.cheats.randomizer: Available cheats are switched on and off at random.
sr.cheats.marathon: Lap count is doubled on all tracks.
sr.cheats.pigstep: All music is replaced with pigstep. AI are piglins.
sr.cheats.pranked: 5% of item chests spawn as Trapped Chests!
sr.cheats.tryhard: AI is replaced with highly skilled Sprint Racer players.
sr.cheats.cargostadium: Cargo Bay has its layout changed.
sr.cheats.customlaps: Lap count is modified by some offset.
sr.cheats.dickdastardly: Players stay in adventure mode after finishing.
sr.cheats.lenient: You can miss up to 1 checkpoint per race.
sr.cheats.naturalregen: Regenerate health automatically instead of sneak-healing.
sr.cheats.skyscapers: Players have elytra and unlimited fireworks.
sr.cheats.praiando: Secret track: Praia de Abril Clássico
sr.cheats.slotlimit: Players are limited in how many hotbar slots they can use.
sr.cheats.practice: Teleport to the next or previous checkpoint on command.
sr.cheats.shoes: Players can equip different shoes to change their stats.
sr.cheats.item_slot_cleared:  Sorry, you can't use more than %s item slot(s)!
sr.cheats.shoes.title: Shoes
sr.villager.death.3: What do you mean I died?
sr.villager.death.5: But I had so much to live for!
sr.villager.death.10: Nobody told me you could die in this racing game!
sr.villager.death.13: I seem to have lost all my hit points.
sr.villager.death.16: I can't believe you've done this!
sr.villager.death.18: I have lost the ability to alive.
sr.villager.death.19: How could you do that to me?
sr.villager.death.20: Argh! I'm so angry right now!
sr.villager.finish.2: I didn't think I would make it.
sr.villager.finish.3: Did I make a high score?
sr.villager.finish.5: At least I still have my dignity.
sr.villager.finish.6: Good game! It would have better if I'd won, though.
sr.villager.finish.11: they don't think it be like it is but it do
sr.villager.finish.19: Can someone tell me where the shortcuts were?
sr.villager.finish.20: You haven't even seen my final form yet.
sr.villager.ko.4: How do you like those emeralds?
sr.villager.ko.5: Oh! Oh a KO! I got a KO!
sr.villager.ko.10: I cannot be bargained with. I cannot be reasoned with. I am an AI. I don't understand anything.
sr.villager.ko.11: You've mistaken me for a passive mob!
sr.villager.ko.14: This village isn't big enough for the two of us.
sr.villager.ko.16: I am the queen of Sprint Racer!
sr.villager.ko.17: I am the king of Sprint Racer!
sr.villager.interact.2: I can't talk now, I'm racing!
sr.villager.interact.5: Sometimes I dream about cheese. Do you feel it? Cheese.
sr.villager.interact.7: Yes yes, hello to you too.
sr.villager.interact.8: I don't have any trades for you! Stop asking!
sr.villager.interact.10: I feel violated by your clicking.
sr.villager.interact.11: Can't talk, I have to win!
sr.villager.start.1: Let's have a good clean race, okay?
sr.villager.start.2: I'm going to win ALL of the points!
sr.villager.start.3: Oh boy, I finally get to play Sprint Racer!
sr.villager.start.8a: Did you know you can enchant your items by pressing
sr.villager.start.10: I'm just a bot. I have no idea what's going on lol
sr.villager.start.14: This doesn't look like my village...
sr.villager.start.22: It's me, Villager from Minecraft! Gotta go fast!
sr.villager.start.24: Well... how did I get here?
sr.villager.start.28: Surrender now or prepare to fight!
sr.villager.start.29: Would you like to hear my mixtape?
sr.villager.start.30: They called me a Nitwit. I'll show them all!
sr.villager.win.2: Don't ever call me a Nitwit!
sr.villager.win.4: Look at me, I've won a Sprint Racer!
sr.villager.win.5: I'm the fastest villager of them all!
sr.villager.win.6: I won! I hope somebody caught that on camera.
sr.villager.win.7: Yes yes, the gold trophy is all mine!
sr.villager.win.14: I can't believe I won that...

sr.custom_track.export_success: Successfully wrote track config data to %s.
sr.custom_track.remember_to_include_regi: Note: relevant files in 'region' and 'entities' will also be needed to transfer your track to another world.
sr.custom_track.export_failed:  Failed to write track config data. Did you choose an illegal file name?
sr.custom_track.imported_track_might_be_:  This track was intended for a later version of Sprint Racer. Some data may be missing.
sr.custom_track.import_failed_uuid:  A track already exists with the same UUID as %s! Aborting track import.
sr.custom_track.import_failed_duplicate:  A track already exists with the exact teleport coordinates of %s! Aborting track import.
sr.custom_track.import_failed_bad_data:  Failed to import custom track. Data from storage %s is incomplete or formatted wrongly.
sr.lobby.arcade.minotaur_mash: A survival horror game where you trek through a maze while avoiding the minotaur.
sr.lobby.arcade.toy_tank_royale: A cute, miniaturized arena shooter game.
sr.lobby.arcade.good_phantom: A fast-paced arcade platforming game where you play as a phantom and enter the dreams of Minecraft players.
sr.lobby.options.race_ai_mode_add:  In race mode, AIs will be added regardless of player count.
sr.lobby.options.race_ai_mode_meet:  In race mode, AIs will be added until the desired player count is reached.
sr.lobby.options.battle_ai_mode_add:  In battle mode, AIs will be added regardless of player count.
sr.lobby.options.battle_ai_mode_meet:  In battle mode, AIs will be added until the desired player count is reached.
sr.lobby.options.race_ai_difficulty_auto:  Race AI difficulty set to adaptive (will cater to player skill level)
sr.lobby.options.race_ai_difficulty_very:  Race AI difficulty set to very easy
sr.lobby.options.race_ai_difficulty_easy:  Race AI difficulty set to easy
sr.lobby.options.race_ai_difficulty_norm:  Race AI difficulty set to normal
sr.lobby.options.race_ai_difficulty_hard:  Race AI difficulty set to hard
sr.lobby.options.battle_ai_difficulty_au:  Battle AI difficulty set to adaptive (will cater to player skill level)
sr.lobby.options.battle_ai_difficulty_ve:  Battle AI difficulty set to very easy
sr.lobby.options.battle_ai_difficulty_ea:  Battle AI difficulty set to easy
sr.lobby.options.battle_ai_difficulty_no:  Battle AI difficulty set to normal
sr.lobby.options.battle_ai_difficulty_ha:  Battle AI difficulty set to hard
sr.lobby.options.ai_rival_on:  AI Rival enabled. CPU_1 will try harder to win.
